price: អល់ឡោះគឺជាអ្នកដែលបានបង្កើតរាល់អ្វីៗទាំងអស់។ ហើយទ្រង់គឺជាអ្នកថែរក្សារាល់អ្វីៗទាំងអស់។
arabic: ٱللَّهُ خَٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَكِيلٞ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu khāliqu kulli shayin wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin wakīlun
